categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Diamond Eyes was the fifth and final embellishment of the Kalidor Crescent, the highest honor awarded by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Kalidor Crescent was awarded for extreme acts of heroism and gallantry against an overwhelming force. The Diamond Eyes were given after a live individual performed a sixth instance of heroism and gallantry and had previously been awarded the Bronze Cluster, the Silver Talons, the Silver Scimitar, and the Golden Wings. It was a pair of small diamonds that were pinned to the ribbon on either side of the kalidor's head.
